text.0: o agni holy and divine with splendour and thy pleasant tongue.
text.1: bring hither and adore the gods.
text.2: we pray thee thou who droppest oil brightrayed who lookest on the sun.
text.3: bring the gods hither to the feast.
text.4: we have enkindled thee o sage bright caller of the gods to feast.
text.6: o agni come with all the gods come to our sacrificial gift.
text.7: we choose thee as invoking priest.
text.8: bring agni to the worshipper who pours the juice heroic strength.
text.9: sit with the gods upon the grass.
text.10: victor of thousands agni thou enkindled cherishest the laws.
text.12: set agni jātavedas down the bearer of our sacred gifts.
text.14: duly proceed our sacrifice comprising all the gods today.
text.15: strew holy grass to be their seat.
text.16: so may the maruts sit thereon the aśvins mitra varuṇa.
text.17: the gods with all their company.
